title: Software Engineer
duties: Collaborated with engineering and product teams to contribute key features to the core product

Frequently wrote internal documentation, tests, and updates to CI/CD pipelines and build tools

title: Software Engineer (Contract)
duties: Worked with a small and nimble cohort to manage work on a desktop application with frequent deployments to users
Built features in a React frontend and Go backend making use of websockets for real time communication
Contributed to product and architecture discussions as the client's userbase and team grew

title: Senior Software Engineer

Configured static site deployment for designers to view Storybook environment

title: Software Engineer

Introduced methodologies and best practices for scalable building and collaboration across a rapidly expanded team
Participated in Scrum workflow to deliver product based on user feedback
Rebuilt core application as a single-page using a wide variety of development tools such as Node, React, Redux, TypeScript, Webpack, and Storybook

title: Front-end Developer
duties: Developed web components for integrating with third-party e-commerce sites, emphasizing performance, cross-browser compatibility, SEO, and best practices

title: Web Producer
